Text.Page:
People are so much fun. I think at my core, I'm really a people person, you know? I feel like I can really connect to—

Hmm? Oh, sure! Orders! I love orders, don't you? You get to go out and kill stuff and get recog—

What? Oh! Yes! You need to kill {@LinkCreature:36#5#magmar teraliths}. Easy!

Talk to Melgina in Tor Exsul once you've cleared them out!
You've got to do a bit more than that. Head on back out there.
